name: Mind Cards (Braincross)
description:
Click on Run Mind Cards to start.

Mind Cards is a relaxing card game by Braincross that makes you think. Mind Cards is completely free. Enjoy and share your scores :)

  • Level 1 features Wild Animals
  • Level 2 features Domesticated Animals
  • Level 3 features Birds

How To Play?

  • Find the matching pairs of the cards by clicking and uncovering them.
  • Find all the matching card or try to do the same till the time ends to advance to the next level.
  • You can find your score at the end of three levels.

Other Instructions

  • You can play the game in PC or phone on browser. No installation required.

Check out Braincross for more.
